title: Zip Captions
shortDescription: Simple, free, easy speech-to-text for everyone, because accessibility should be free.
longDescription: A free, open-source, and browser-based captioning application built with a modern TypeScript-driven stack and a commitment to accessibility, allowing users to generate captions directly in their browser at no cost.

images.alt: Screen shot of the Zip Captions landing page
images.caption: The landing page of the web application

challenges: Providing real-time speech to text at low- to no-cost across all devices for anyone, anywhere, at any time.
learnings: Processing audio in real-time via streaming sockets. Peer-to-peer sharing via WebRTC. Encrypted data stored in IndexedDB using a two-part key.
